short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun quiz game to improve your financial literacy day by day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Finance Quest, the financial literacy quiz game! This engaging and interactive quiz extension is designed to help you improve your financial literacy one question at a time. With a fresh set of challenges waiting for you every day, you'll not only test your current knowledge but also expand your understanding of essential financial concepts.

Key Features:

Daily Quizzes: Engage in new quizzes each day to continually enhance your financial knowledge.

Variety of Topics: Explore a wide range of subjects, including budgeting, investing, saving, and financial planning.

Interactive Learning: Enjoy a gamified experience with a timer and scoring system that makes learning fun and competitive.

Leaderboard: Track your progress and compete with friends to see who can achieve the highest score.

Streak Counter: Stay motivated with a streak feature that encourages consistent learning.

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate easily through questions and options with a clean, intuitive design.

Make Finance Quest a part of your daily routine and watch your confidence and knowledge grow. Join us in the quest for financial mastery, and turn learning into a daily adventure!
